poses.name: Mountain Pose
poses.description: Foundation for all standing poses. Stand tall like a mountain.
instructions: Stand with feet together or hip-width apart
Distribute weight evenly on both feet
Engage thigh muscles and lift kneecaps
Lengthen spine upward
Relax shoulders away from ears
Arms at sides with palms facing forward
Breathe deeply and hold for 30-60 seconds

poses.name: Tree Pose
poses.description: Balance pose that improves focus and stability. Stand steady like a tree.
instructions: Stand on left leg, ground through foot
Place right foot on left inner thigh or calf (avoid knee)
Bring hands to prayer position at chest
Focus on a fixed point ahead
Hold for 30 seconds
Repeat on other side

poses.name: Warrior II
poses.description: Powerful standing pose that builds strength, stamina, and concentration.
instructions: Step feet wide apart (about 4 feet)
Turn right foot out 90°, left foot in slightly
Bend right knee over right ankle
Extend arms parallel to floor
Gaze over right middle finger
Keep hips open to the side
Hold for 30 seconds, then switch sides
